name: German Salad
ingredients: 2 tablespoons granular Splenda or equivalent liquid Splenda
1 1/2 ounces red onion, sliced thin (about 1/4 cup)

instructions.en: Fry the chopped bacon until crisp. Drain on paper towels and reserve 2 tablespoons of the bacon grease.
instructions.sk: Opečte nakrájanú slaninu do chrumkava. Nechajte odkvapkať na papierových utierka a odložte 2 lyžice slaniny.
instructions.ja: 刻んだベーコンをカリカリになるまで炒めます。キッチンペーパーで油を切り、ベーコンの脂2大さじを取っておきます。

instructions.en: Let the reserved bacon grease cool for 5-10 minutes.
instructions.ja: 取っておいたベーコンの脂を5〜10分間冷まします。

instructions.en: In a bowl, whisk together the cooled bacon grease, vinegar, Splenda, and mayonnaise to make the dressing.
instructions.sk: V miske vyšľahajte vychladnutú slaninu, ocot, Splendu a majonézu na prípravu dresingu.
instructions.ja: ボウルに冷めたベーコンの脂、酢、スプレンダ、マヨネーズを入れて泡立て器でよく混ぜ、ドレッシングを作ります。

instructions.en: Chop the romaine lettuce and hard boiled eggs. Slice the cucumber, halve the grape tomatoes, thinly slice the mushroom and red onion.
instructions.sk: Nakrájajte rímsky šalát a vajcia natvrdo. Nakrájajte uhorku, prekrojte hrozno paradajky, nakrájajte huby a červenú cibuľu na tenké plátky.
instructions.ja: ロメインレタスとゆで卵を刻みます。キュウリをスライスし、ミニトマトを半分に切り、マッシュルームと赤玉ねぎを薄切りにします。

instructions.en: In a large bowl, combine the prepared vegetables, eggs, and crispy bacon.
instructions.sk: Vo veľkej miske zmiešajte pripravenú zeleninu, vajcia a chrumkavú slaninu.
instructions.ja: 大きなボウルに準備した野菜、卵、カリカリのベーコンを入れます。

instructions.en: Pour the dressing over the salad and toss well to coat everything evenly.
instructions.sk: Prelejte dresing cez šalát a dobre premiešajte, aby sa všetko rovnomerne obalilo.
instructions.ja: サラダにドレッシングをかけ、全体に均等にからむようによく混ぜ合わせます。

notes: This German Salad is a keto-friendly twist on a traditional German potato salad, omitting the potatoes to keep it low-carb. The warm bacon dressing gives it a rich, savory flavor, while the Splenda adds a touch of sweetness without the carbs. The combination of crisp vegetables, hard-boiled eggs, and bacon makes for a satisfying and nutritious meal. For best flavor, serve this salad immediately while the dressing is still warm. If you prefer, you can substitute the Splenda with a different keto-friendly sweetener of your choice.
